title: Isa TKM
overview: The party is about to begin â€“ Isa's true love is only a playlist away. This fun story about teens and tweens combines comedy, music and romance in a plot that centers on Isabella, known as "Isa," a charismatic girl who faces her first love, first kiss, and all of the other teen firsts. ISA TKM (TKM is short for "Te Quiero Mucho" in a text message) chronicles the adventures, trials and tribulations, successes, and failures of its adolescent protagonists with bold and irreverent humor, warmth and wisdom.
